altername_name: Polykos Super Jelly Bean Quest in the Sketchbook of Illusion
name: Polyko's Super Jelly Bean Quest in the Sketchbook of Illusion
overview: This is a free game, originally developed by HotPengu and brought to the Dreamcast by Senile Team. In this small but charming game you control artist Polyko, who has been magically transported into the world of his own creations.
